Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan are led by Rashid Khan at the ICC T20 World Cup 2024 and their strength will be their spin department consisting of Mujeeb Ur Rahman, Noor Ahmad, Nangyal Kharoti and veteran Mohammad Nabi alongside the skipper.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan are placed in a relatively tough group with co-hosts West Indies, New Zealand, Uganda and Papua New Guinea.
Others: Afghanistan's ICC T20 World Cup 2024 Fixtures include matches against Uganda, New Zealand, Papua New Guinea, and West Indies.
